III . What effect CLOSER intervention patient psychological outcome ( anxiety distress ) , control primary stressor ( type stage/grade cancer , patient quality life ) , distance caregiver structural factors/stressors ( caregiver age , gender , race , employment ) , baseline anxiety distress ? What feasibility ( time , cost , resource acceptability patient , caregiver clinician ) use Adobe Connect , computer-based web communication system , distance caregiver , parent advance cancer , health care provider together routine follow-up oncology office visit ? V. What experience distance caregiver participate CLOSER intervention ? OUTLINE : Participants assign 1 2 arm . ARM I : Participants receive usual care 5 week . During week 5 office visit , distance caregiver present . ARM II : Participants receive usual care 5 week . During week 5 visit , distance caregiver virtually attend use CLOSER intervention computer video audio connection . After completion study , participant follow within 48-96 hour .
